title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 102 - Limitations On Use Of Thruway System
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 102 - Limitations On Use Of Thruway System

State Regulations
§ 102.1 - Prohibited uses of the Thruway
§ 102.2 - Prohibition of liquor and other intoxicating beverages
§ 102.3 - Prohibited practices concerning motor fuel prices and sales
§ 102.4 - Hitchhiking; loitering
§ 102.5 - Commercial activity; solicitation of funds
§ 102.6 - Waste and rubbish
§ 102.7 - Damage to property
§ 102.8 - Acts interfering with Thruway operations
§ 102.9 - Exclusion of Vehicles from Thruway System for Non-Compliance
§ 102.10 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 102

Statutory authority: Public Authorities Law, art. 2, title
9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
